answers.answer: u know what u have hypchobdria and i know how it feels sweet , its very hard to escape .. i promise u that u dont have any disecse . but u do have major anxiety were u think that the fear is going to harm u.. just take it easy only u can change your life and nothing is easy think of it as a competition the first person who can become anxiety free wins ..think positive .. there is nothing wrong with u.. and i u think that u are going to have stomch cancer or a heart attack or what ever u think it will make it worse trust me i get alot o stomach pain and sharpness in my stomache because of thnking to much and i think im going to get a stroke or im going to die .. i think  have brain tumors as well but that dosnt mean i do i stop and think for a second and i say to my seld wait there is nothing wrong with me what am i doing to my self and my life? before you even know it youl find your self as the age of 50 life is short . and u will regret it and tell your self .. how could i have done this to my self and u will find out that nothing had happend to u so live life and enjoy as much as u can if u still cant try getting medication ease your mind .. and let me tell u one thing the mind dosnt know te difference between fake and real if ur brain thinks of vomitting .. u will feel u want to vommit but let me tell u one thing that dosnt meen the feeling will hurt u all u need to do is relax not your body but your mind give it a go and good luck xx if u want to chat and ask more questions go ahed i will help

question: I've had health anxiety for the past 5 months and there's no letting up no matter what it seems.  I've gone from one thing to another.  I've probably covered just about every major disease their is and thinking I have it.  I've learned a whole lot about health but not in ways I wanted to.  I've gone from thinking I've had HIV, lung cancer, liver cancer, pancreatic cancer, brain tumors, colon cancer, stomach cancer, kidney cancer, and hypertension.  I dont know what to think at this moment.  I'm at the point where I feel as if I could have every cancer in the book.Here are the symptoms I'm experiencing right now:- minor headaches everyday- lightheadedness- dizziness- stomach makes noises like crazy after i eat- frequent urination- yellow or pale stools- always feeling tired- sore throat in the morningsI've been to the docs about 5 times and the hospital 2 times in the past 5 months.  I've had multiple tests done (all came back just fine) here they are:- kidney function blood test & other basic blood tests- HIV blood test- Diabetes blood test (the finger poke)- liver enzyme blood test (and other which goes with it)- stool samples looking for parasite/infection- complete eye exam from optometristSo with these tests, I can rule out HIV, liver cancer, diabetes, parasites, and maybe a few others.  I dont know if I can rule out pancreatic cancer or a brain tumor.  Can an enzyme test rule ut pancreatic cancer?  Can an eye exam help rule out brain tumors considering brain tumors can effect your vision?  I'm a mess right now and I would appreciate some help on here.  My doctor is obviously sick of seeing me every month.  Nursegirl is very smart as far as this stuff goes so if she reads this please assist!  Any other replies would really help I just need some guidance to be pointed in the right path.
title: Dont know what to do anymore, it's a living hell
